name: Paws & Claws: Pet Vet
overview: My Vet Practice for Nintendo Wii allows you to run your own veterinary practice! You will examine and treat small and large animals alike and have to buy medicine and instruments in a nearby town. The game is also a totally fun mix of mini-games and activities surrounding the pets and your practice! My Vet Practice also allows you to buy your own horse, care for it and to ride across the beautiful countryside, which surrounds your practice. Educate yourself by attending animal health courses, and earn money by treating animals. Simply become the best veterinarian around, and create the biggest pet clinic in town! * 7 kind of animals in different color variations including birds, cats, dogs and horses * More than 50 different illnesses and diseases to treat * 20 different medical instruments and kinds of medications * 3 extensive riding levels * The development was assisted by real veterinarians.
